data.title: That’s Amore! Russell Crowe gets married in Rome!
data.meta_description: Russell Crowe loves the country of Italy so much that the actor once said he would “use any excuse” to travel back there. So it’s no surprise that Russell has c
data.text:
Summary by nowtolove.com.au

Russell Crowe loves the country of Italy so much that the actor once said he would “use any excuse” to travel back there. So it’s no surprise that Russell has chosen it as the beautiful backdrop for his wedding to American fiancee Britney Theriot! SECOND HOME Russell, 60, and Britney, 32, were seen in full-on tourist mode in Rome last week, riding through the bustling streets on scooters ahead of his band The Gentlemen Barbers’ gigs in the city.…
